name: FREEDOM FIGHTER SHRI NAVIN CHANDRA ARYA EDUCATIONAL SOCIETY
briefDescription: We were established on July 08, 1991, on the occasion of 67th Birth Anniversary of Freedom Fighter & Veteran Journalist Late Shri Navin Chandra Arya. We offer Education programmes, Organisation Development Programmes, Management & Legal Consultancy Services, Counselling Services and Publication Services through our respective Divisions. We believe in Survival by sheer Merit. All our activities are focused on Growth & Development of the people, offering “Value for Money” through constant up-gradation & Development of their knowledge, skills, performance, capacities & potential. We have been relentless pursuing our Mission & Objectives since over inception and have so far brought positive changes in the life of more than 10, 00, 000 people th
